sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_62500_mealplan_recipe"> <x_62500_mealplan_recipe action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <active>true</active> <cook_time>1970-01-01 00:15:00</cook_time> <cooking_instructions>1. Slice baguette and toast. 2. Dice tomatoes and chop basil. 3. Mix tomatoes, basil, garlic, olive oil, balsamic vinegar, salt, and pepper. 4. Spoon mixture onto toasted baguette slices.</cooking_instructions> <cuisine display_value="Italian">4f495a179791021069a3b6fce053afce</cuisine> <diet>bca1c6979711021069a3b6fce053af90</diet> <effort display_value="Easy">fae0a76e9730021069a3b6fce053af3e</effort> <image/> <ingredients>Baguette (1), Tomatoes (2), Fresh Basil </ingredients> <meal_type display_value="Appetizer">91508fd39755021069a3b6fce053af8b</meal_type> <name>Tomato Basil Bruschetta</name> <nutrition>Calories: 150, Protein: 5g, Fat: 7g, Carbs: 20g</nutrition> <owned_by display_value="MP Admin">cbb877e697b0021069a3b6fce053af41</owned_by> <pre_cook>false</pre_cook> <prep_instructions>1. Prepare ingredients. 2.
